definition: (interjection) oh!/(dialect) to stuff sth in one's mouth/(used in buddhist transliterations) om
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
variant of 閹|阉[yan1]/to castrate/variant of 淹[yan1]/to delay
Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
pinyin: an3 ma5 ni2 ba1 mi1 hong1

sentences.english: O God Siva, this woman must be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 唵，頂禮溼婆，這個女人是一定要被消滅的。

sentences.english: The first character is " nan (Sanskrit: om)".

definition: roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage
Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
pinyin: an3 ma5 ni2 ba1 mi1 hong1

definition: used for the sound "zha" in certain names
denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)
prajña paramita (Sanskrit: supreme wisdom - beginning of the Heart Sutra)
crowd/transliteration of Sanskrit 'kso', e.g. Aksobhya Buddha 阿閦佛
